original_title: Symbiotic Earth: How Lynn Margulis rocked the boat and started a scientific revolution
overview: Symbiotic Earth explores the life and ideas of Lynn Margulis, a brilliant and radical scientist, whose unconventional theories challenged the male-dominated scientific community and are today fundamentally changing how we look at our selves, evolution, and the environment. (IMDb)
tagline: The life and ideas of radical scientist Lynn Margulis.
title: Symbiotic Earth: How Lynn Margulis rocked the boat and started a scientific revolution
